docs.summary: Calculates tax for the provided line items.
description:
Tax is calculated for each line item based on the [tax region](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/business-management/payments/tax/tax-regions)
that corresponds to the address provided in `lineItems.addressIndex` and the tax group in `taxGroupId`. If no tax region is found for
the line item's address then no tax will be calculated for this line item. If no tax group with that `taxGroupId` is found then the
[default tax group](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/business-management/payments/tax/tax-groups/list-default-tax-groups) is used to calculate tax.

The tax is calculated by a tax calculator app installed on the site.
Use [List Tax Calculators](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/business-management/payments/tax/tax-calculation/list-tax-calculators)
to see which tax calculators are available. To provide your own tax calculations, use the [Tax Calculation Integration Service Plugin](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/business-management/payments/tax/tax-calculation-integration-spi).

The breakdown of calculated tax returned, includes:
+ `taxSummary`: The overall total tax calculated.
+ `taxSummary.aggregatedTaxBreakdown`: The total tax calculated for each jurisdiction.
+ `lineItemTaxDetails.taxSummary`: The total tax calculated for each line item.
+ `lineItemTaxDetails.taxBreakdown`: The tax calculated for each line item in each jurisdiction.

examples.title: calculateTax example for exporting from backend code

docs.summary: Retrieves a list of installed tax calculators.

examples.title: listTaxCalculators example for dashboard page code
listTaxCalculators example for exporting from backend code

members.name: addressLine1
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number as free text.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address information, such as apartment, suite, or floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: country
members.doc: 2-letter country code in [ISO-3166 alpha-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2) format.

description: Wix common address format for physical address to use if you plan to store addresses in your service.

members.name: multipleAddresses
members.doc:
Multiple addresses to use for a sale. For example, some tax calculations may require both the address where an item is shipped from,
as well as the address the item is shipped to.

members.name: singleAddress
members.doc: Single address to use for a sale location when only one address is required for tax calculations. The index is zero-based.

description: Index of the address from `addresses` to use to calculate tax for this specific line item. The index is zero-based.

members.name: multipleAddresses
members.doc:
Multiple addresses to use for a sale. For example, some tax calculations may require both the address where an item is shipped from,
as well as the address the item is shipped to.

members.name: singleAddress
members.doc: Single address to use for a sale location when only one address is required for tax calculations. The index is zero-based.

members.name: aggregatedTaxAmount
members.doc: Total amount of this tax for this jurisdiction.

members.name: jurisdiction
members.doc: Jurisdiction that taxes were calculated for.

members.name: jurisdictionType
members.doc: Type of jurisdiction that taxes were calculated for.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Tax rate used for this jurisdiction, as a decimal. For example, 10% tax is `"0.1000"` and 200% tax is `"2.0000"`.

members.name: taxName
members.doc: Name of the tax that was calculated.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: Type of tax that was calculated.

description:
The summary of the tax breakdown for all the line items. It will hold for each tax name, the aggregated tax amount paid for it and the tax rate.
Tax breakdown is the tax amount split to the tax authorities that applied on the line item.

members.name: code
members.doc: Error code.

members.name: data
members.doc: Data related to the error.

members.name: description
members.doc: Description of the error.

members.name: addresses
members.doc: Array of addresses. Each line item can individually reference the address to apply with `lineItems.addressIndex`.

members.name: currency
members.doc: 3-letter currency code in [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: Optional ID of the entity that tax is being calculated for. For example, a cart ID.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items to calculate tax for.

members.name: addresses
members.doc: Array of addresses. Each line item can individually reference the address to apply with `lineItems.addressIndex`.

members.name: currency
members.doc: 3-letter currency code in [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: Optional ID of the entity that tax is being calculated for. For example, a cart ID.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Line items to calculate tax for.

members.name: addresses
members.doc: Array of addresses. Each line item can individually reference the address to apply with `lineItems.addressIndex`.

members.name: currency
members.doc: 3-letter currency code in [ISO-4217 alphabetic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#Active_codes) format.

members.name: errors
members.doc: Errors that occurred during the tax calculation.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: Optional ID of the entity that tax is being calculated for. For example, a cart ID.

members.name: lineItemTaxDetails
members.doc: Details of each tax applied to each line item.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Summary of the tax calculated.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: addressIndex
members.doc: Index of the address from `addresses` to use to calculate tax for this specific line item. The index is zero-based.

members.name: appId
members.doc:
ID of the app providing the catalog for this line item.

You can get your app's ID from its page in the [Wix Dev Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).

For items from Wix catalogs, the following values always apply:
+ Wix Stores: `"215238eb-22a5-4c36-9e7b-e7c08025e04e"`
+ Wix Bookings: `"13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97"`
+ Wix Restaurants: `"9a5d83fd-8570-482e-81ab-cfa88942ee60"`

members.name: itemCode
members.doc: Stock keeping unit for this line item. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: itemName
members.doc: Line item name to display.

members.name: price
members.doc: Line item price.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Line item quantity.

members.name: taxGroupId
members.doc: Tax group ID for this line item. If not provided, the default tax group applies.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price.

description: Line items to calculate tax for.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Line item ID.

members.name: addressIndex
members.doc: Index of the address from `addresses` to use to calculate tax for this specific line item. The index is zero-based.

members.name: itemName
members.doc: Line item name to display.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Line item quantity.

members.name: taxBreakdown
members.doc: Array of each tax applied, grouped by `jurisdiction`.

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Whether tax is included in the price.

members.name: taxSummary
members.doc: Summary of this line item's total price and tax.

description: Tax details for a specific line item.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the calculator app that calculated tax for this line item.

members.name: fullPrice
members.doc:
Total price for this line item.
To determine the price for each individual unit of this line item, divide by `quantity`.

members.name: taxAmount
members.doc: Total amount of tax calculated for this line item.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Total taxable amount for this line item.

members.name: taxCalculatorDetails
members.doc: Retrieved tax calculators.

members.name: destination
members.doc: Index of the destination address.

members.name: origin
members.doc: Index of the origin address.

description:
MultipleAddresses are used for example for tax calculation of items shipped from store warehouse to a shipping address.
In this case origin is the warehouse address and destination is the shipping address.

members.name: jurisdiction
members.doc: Jurisdiction that taxes were calculated for.

members.name: jurisdictionType
members.doc: Type of jurisdiction that taxes were calculated for. For example, `"State"`, `"Ã‡ounty"`, `"City"`, `"Special"`, etc.

members.name: nonTaxableAmount
members.doc: Non-taxable amount of the price.

members.name: rate
members.doc: Tax rate used for this jurisdiction, as a decimal. For example, 10% tax is `"0.1000"` and 200% tax is `"2.0000"`.

members.name: taxAmount
members.doc: Amount of this tax calculated for this jurisdiction.

members.name: taxName
members.doc: Name of the tax that was calculated. For example, `"NY State Sales Tax"`, `"Quebec GST"`, etc.

members.name: taxType
members.doc: Type of tax that was calculated. For example, `"Sales Tax"`, `"Income Tax"`, `"Value Added Tax"`, etc.

members.name: taxableAmount
members.doc: Taxable amount of the price.

description: A detailed description of all the tax authorities applied on this item.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the tax calculator.

members.name: displayName
members.doc: Display name of the tax calculator.

members.name: unsupportedCountries
members.doc: List of countries, in [ISO-3166 alpha-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements) format, that the calculator does not support.

members.name: aggregatedTaxBreakdown
members.doc: Array of each tax applied, grouped by `"jurisdiction"`, `"jurisdiction_type"`, `"tax_type"`, `"tax_name"` and `"tax_rate"`.

members.name: totalAmount
members.doc: Total price for all line items.

members.name: totalTax
members.doc:
Total amount of tax calculated for all line items.
Note that due to rounding, `totalTax` may not equal the sum of `lineItemTaxDetails.taxSummary.taxAmount`.

members.name: totalTaxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Total amount of `totalTax` that is included in price. Applies to line items with `taxIncludedInPrice` set to `true`.

members.name: totalTaxableAmount
members.doc: Total taxable amount for all line items.
